name: Send email to Activate/ Integration and Product not imported

parameters.query:
SELECT *
FROM stores
JOIN users u ON stores.user_id = u.id
WHERE stores.integration IN ('shopify', 'wix', 'woocommerce')
AND YEAR(stores.updated_at) = YEAR(NOW())
AND MONTH(stores.updated_at) = MONTH(NOW())
AND DAY(stores.updated_at) = DAY(NOW())- 2
AND stores.deleted_at IS NULL;

parameters.subject: Notification for New Unsynchronized Product from Printcart

parameters.query:
SELECT users.email, users.name FROM categories
JOIN stores ON categories.store_id = stores.id
JOIN users ON stores.user_id = users.id
WHERE categories.uuid = '{{ $json.categoryId }}'

parameters.subject: Notification of Store Activation from Printcart

parameters.query:
SELECT users.name, users.email FROM users
WHERE users.uuid = '{{ $json.uuid}}'

parameters.subject: Notification of Store Activation from Printcart
Notification of Store Activation from Printcart

parameters.name: content
content
content
content
content
parameters.value:
Dear Ocean,

We are writing to inform you about the status of activation/integration of your store with our platform. Unfortunately, we encountered a connection failure during the activation process.

Fix Store Integration with Printcart


Please take immediate action to resolve the connection issue to ensure successful activation/integration of your store with our platform. You may need to review your settings and credentials to ensure they are correct and up-to-date.

If you require any assistance or have any questions regarding the activation/integration process, please don't hesitate to contact our support team at support@printcart.com. We are here to assist you and ensure a smooth activation/integration process.

Thank you for choosing our platform.

Best regards,

Ryan D.G. (Mr.)
Business & Project Consultant
